name: Ablockalypse
description:
A classic reignited...

Can you place all the pieces together before the time runs out? Put your spatial visualization ability to the test with this quick paced action puzzle game which will continually keep you coming back for more. Work the the first level which is available now and see how many complete lines you can make.

In this current early access release version of the game we have available the first level which has a specific speed. You can completely play the first level as the main game engine is complete.

We plan to add more levels as the project is polished and completed. We plan to increase the speed at which the blocks fall with each successive level. I hope you will enjoy Ablockalypse in is early release state as we have worked hard to bring you the best play-ability for a game of this particular genre.
